videos.description: Ayo Dosunmu drives along the baseline and posterizes Alperen Sengun with a massive dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Ayo Dosunmu gets up for the beautiful flush) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dosunmu rises up for the huge poster on Sengun

videos.description: Javonte Green comes up with the steal and then finishes on the end with a massive dunk.
